protesters at a Donald Trump rally, leading Trump to cancel the event. On
Saturday, Trump blamed the protesters and "thugs" — a racially coded word
But maybe Trump should blame himself. As Rachel Maddow demonstrated in a
string of clips aired on MSNBC, Trump has consistently called for violence
